parameters.name: filename
parameters.desc: Input csv file for evaluting model

input.name: imagepath
input.desc: Input image path for evaluting model

name: data_getxy
description: Split CSV data to X and Y

input.name: dataframe
input.desc: Input data table which need to be split

input.name: xcols
input.desc: List of columns for X split

input.name: ycols
input.desc: Y column which will act as result for X set

name: data_handlemissing
description: Handle missing data by either filling or droping

input.name: dataframe
input.desc: Input data table which need to be cleaned up from missing data

input.name: type
input.desc: Type of action to handle missing data

input.name: ycols
input.desc: Y column which will act as result for X set
